name: Note Card
description:
Even though Figma comments are one of the most well-crafted features in software history, sometimes a note needs to be more prominent, visible, or permanent, so I created Note Card.


Featuring

  • Auto-height based on the amount of text
  • Flexible width
  • Two sizes: Small and Large


Elements

  • Bubble (use it to mark the source, category, or domain of the note)
  • Type (Note, Comment, Question, Etc.)
  • Date
  • Body Text
